issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: dagw
assignee.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

fields.environment:
OS: ubuntu
Linux .... 32bits
Linux 2.6.22-14-generic #1 SMP Sun Oct 14 23:05:12 GMT 2007 GNU/Linux

JVM:
Product: phoneME Advanced (phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34)
Profile: Foundation Profile Specification 1.1
JVM:     CVM phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34 (interpreter loop)

comments.body:
I have noticed the NPE on weme 6.1 couple times. The stack trace looks as follows

testSemantics(org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RolesTest)junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBCDataSource.getDataSourceObject(JDBCDataSource.java:176)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.J2EEDataSource.getConnectionPoolDataSource(J2EEDataSource.java:58)

	at org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RolesTest.testSemantics(RolesTest.java:647)
	at java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject.invokeV(AccessibleObject.java:205)
	at <unknown class>.<unknown method>(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestCase.runBare(BaseTestCase.java:104)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)

author.name: dagw
author.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

comments.body:
Uploading a patch the skips a test that uses ConnectionPoolDataSource
if running under JSR169. If someone can try to run RolesTest on a small device
platform, I can commit it.

updateAuthor.name: dagw
updateAuthor.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

author.name: olesolberg
author.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

comments.body:
I ran RolesTest with the patch on 

Product: phoneME Advanced (phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34)
Profile: Foundation Profile Specification 1.1
JVM:     CVM phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34 (interpreter loop)

(Host OS: Linux 2.6.22-14-generic #1 SMP Sun Oct 14 23:05:12 GMT 2007 GNU/Linux)

cvm   -Xgc:youngGen=5M -Xmn256M -DderbyTesting.oldReleasePath=/usr/local/share/java/derby/lib -Dderby.tests.trace=true \
    -cp ${CLASSPATH} junit.textui.TestRunner org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RolesTest \
    >  logfile_org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RolesTest.out

logfile_org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RolesTest.out: 
.
testNegativeSyntax used 8044 ms .
testNegativeSyntax used 870 ms .
testNegativeSyntax used 141 ms .
testPositiveSyntax used 1349 ms .
testSemantics used 267 ms .
testSemantics used 4637 ms .
testSemantics used 686 ms 
Time: 27.161

OK (7 tests)
